DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: BENELI, T. M.;BENELI, TALITA MOTTA;BENELI, T.M.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Possui mestrado em Ecologia e Biomonitoramento pela Universidade Federal da Bahia - UFBA (2019), pуs-graduaзгo em andamento em Docкncia no Ensino Superior: Tecnologias Educacionais e Inovaзгo e em Perнcia e Auditoria Ambiental pela Universidade Cesumar ? Unicesumar. Й licenciada em Ciкncias Biolуgicas pela Universidade Estadual de Maringб ? UEM (2016) com um perнodo sanduнche atravйs do programa do governo federal Ciкncia sem Fronteiras na James Cook University, Austrбlia (2013/14) com кnfase em ecologia marinha e conservaзгo.
Atuou como estagiбria na бrea de Genйtica (2010/11), com кnfase em Genйtica do Desenvolvimento, onde desenvolveu trabalhos de iniciaзгo cientнfica, no HUEM (Herbбrio da Universidade Estadual de Maringб) (2012), no Programa Institucional de Bolsa de Iniciaзгo а Docкncia ? PIBID de Biologia pela Universidade Estadual de Maringб ? UEM (2012/13), como educadora ambiental pela Prefeitura de Maringб, PR (2013), como pesquisadora estagiбria no Projeto Conservaзгo Recifal na unidade de conservaзгo marinha APA dos Corais (Tamandarй - PE) (2015) e como tutora EAD no Ensino Superior pela Universidade Cesumar ? Unicesumar (2019/20). Atualmente, й professora conteudista no Curso de Pedagogia (EAD) na Uniгo de Faculdades Metropolitanas de Maringб (Centro Universitбrio Unifamma) na disciplina de Fundamentos e Metodologia do Ensino de Ciкncias e atua com pesquisa na бrea de impactos antrуpicos em recifes de corais.
Possui cursos de mergulho bбsico (PADI) e avanзado (NAUII).
Tem experiкncia nas бreas de Ensino de Ciкncias, Biologia e Oceanografia Biolуgica, Educaзгo ambiental, Ensino EAD e Ecologia Marinha, Peixes Recifais e Hidrocorais.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
I have a master's degree in Ecology and Biomonitoring from the Federal University of Bahia - UFBA , Brazil (2019), an ongoing graduate course in Teaching in Higher Education: Educational Technologies and Innovation and in Environmental Expertise and Auditing from the Universidade Cesumar - Unicesumar, Brazil. Also, I am a bachelor in Biological Sciences from the State University of Maringб - UEM, Brazil (2016) with an exchange period through the federal government's program entitled Science without Borders at James Cook University, Australia (2013/14) with emphasis on marine ecology and conservation.
I worked as an intern in a ​​Genetics laboratory (2010/11), with an emphasis on Developmental Genetics, where I developed scientific initiation studies at HUEM (Herbarium of the State University of Maringб), Brazil (2012), in the Institutional Scholarship Program for Initiation to Teaching - PIBID of Biology by the State University of Maringб - UEM, Brazil (2012/13), as an environmental educator by the City Hall of Maringб, PR, Brazil (2013), as an intern researcher in the Reef Conservation Project at the marine protected area APA dos Corais (Tamandarй - PE), Brazil (2015) and as a distance learning tutor in Higher Education at Cesumar University - Unicesumar, Brazil (2019/20). Currently, I am a content teacher in the Pedagogy Course (EAD) at the Union of Faculdades Metropolitanas de Maringб (Centro Universitбrio Unifamma), Brazil, for the Fundamentals and Methodology of Science Education subject and work with scientific research in ​​anthropogenic impacts on coral reefs.
I have basic diving (PADI) and advanced (NAUII) diving courses.
I have experience experience in the areas of Science Education, Biology and Biological Oceanography, Environmental Education, Distance Education, Marine Ecology, Coral Reef Ecology, Reef Fish and Hydrocorals.
